title: User Registration and Login via WhatsApp OTP
description: Verify that users can successfully register and log in using WhatsApp-based OTP authentication flow with correct phone input and OTP validation.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page
Input a valid WhatsApp phone number
Request OTP and receive it via WhatsApp
Enter the received OTP in the application
Submit the OTP for verification
Verify that login is successful and user is redirected to dashboard

title: User Login via Email OTP
description: Verify that users can successfully log in using Email OTP authentication with correct email input and OTP validation.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page
Input a valid email address
Request OTP and receive it via email
Enter the received OTP in the application
Submit the OTP for verification
Verify that login is successful and user is redirected to dashboard

title: Login Failure with Invalid OTP
description: Verify that login fails when an invalid or expired OTP is submitted.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page
Input a valid phone number or email
Request OTP
Enter an invalid or expired OTP
Submit the OTP
Verify that login fails and appropriate error message is shown

title: Task CRUD Operations with Valid Inputs
description: Verify that tasks can be created, read, updated, and deleted with valid multi-language inputs, and that status and comments functions work correctly.

steps.description: Login and navigate to the Task management page
Create a new task with valid multi-language title and description
Verify task is listed with correct details
Edit the task to update fields including status and assignment
Verify the updates are reflected correctly
Add comments to the task
Verify the comments display correctly with timestamps
Delete the task
Verify task is removed from the list

title: Task Creation Form Validation with Multi-language Input
description: Verify client-side form validation handles missing fields, invalid characters and supports multi-language inputs with real-time feedback.

steps.description: Navigate to the Task creation page
Attempt to create a task without entering required fields
Verify validation errors are shown for required fields
Enter invalid characters or unsupported language scripts
Verify appropriate validation messages are displayed
Enter valid multi-language input (e.g., Arabic, Chinese)
Verify no validation errors and input is accepted

title: Project Creation and Team Assignment
description: Verify users can create new projects, assign team members with roles, and collaborate within project management interface.

steps.description: Login and navigate to Project management page
Create a new project with valid details
Verify project appears in the project list with correct information
Assign team members with specific roles (e.g., admin, editor, viewer)
Verify team members are correctly assigned with designated roles
Perform updates to the project details and save
Verify project updates are persisted
Delete the project
Verify project is removed from list and team members no longer have access

title: Team Management with Role Assignment
description: Verify team page allows adding/removing users, assigning roles, and managing contacts with correct permission enforcement.

steps.description: Navigate to team management page
Add new team members with valid contact info
Verify new members appear with correct details
Assign roles to team members
Verify roles reflect in UI and restrict/allow appropriate access
Remove a team member
Verify the member is removed and no longer listed

title: WhatsApp Messaging and Notifications Integration
description: Verify that WhatsApp messages and notifications are sent correctly through the admin interface with webhook integration for incoming communication.

steps.description: Login to the WhatsApp admin dashboard
Send a test WhatsApp message to a valid number
Verify message is delivered and status is confirmed
Trigger a notification from a task or project event
Verify notification is sent via WhatsApp to designated users
Simulate an incoming WhatsApp webhook message
Verify system processes the webhook and updates UI accordingly

title: Template Creation and Usage for Tasks and Projects
description: Verify that users can create, save, edit, and apply task and project templates effectively for quick setup.

steps.description: Navigate to the Template management page
Create a new task template with required fields
Verify the template is saved and listed correctly
Create a new project template with predefined parameters
Verify the project template is saved correctly
Apply a task template to create a new task
Verify task is created with template data prefilled

title: Analytics Dashboard Data Visualization Accuracy
description: Verify that the analytics dashboard renders accurate and timely charts, graphs and metrics reflecting tasks, projects, and team performance.

steps.description: Log in and navigate to the analytics dashboard
Review displayed charts and data visualizations
Verify data accuracy by comparing with backend data
Filter analytics by project, date range, team member
Verify filters update the visualizations correctly and efficiently

title: Routing and Navigation with Protected Routes
description: Verify that application navigation via React Router works correctly with protected routes preventing unauthorized access.

steps.description: Attempt to access protected page without login
Verify redirect to login page occurs
Login successfully
Navigate to various protected routes
Verify pages load properly without errors or warnings

title: Accessibility Compliance Verification
description: Verify all UI components comply with accessibility standards including ARIA roles, keyboard navigability, and screen reader support.

steps.description: Navigate app pages using keyboard only
Verify full keyboard navigation and focus states are present and logical
Use screen reader on common UI components like forms, modals, and buttons
Verify ARIA labels and roles announce correct information

title: API Error Handling and Retry Logic
description: Verify that the backend API client correctly handles errors and retries calls according to defined logic without crashing the app.

steps.description: Simulate API failures such as timeouts and server errors when performing entity CRUD operations
Verify the client retries the request according to retry policy
Verify user-friendly error messages appear when retries fail
Verify the application remains responsive and stable without crashes

title: Responsive Design Verification on Multiple Devices
description: Verify application UI renders correctly and remains usable across various device screen sizes including mobile, tablet, and desktop.

steps.description: Open app on devices or simulators of different screen sizes (320px to 1920px width)
Verify layout adjusts properly with no broken elements or overflow
Verify navigation and interactive elements remain accessible

title: Real-time Notifications and Toast Messages
description: Verify that notification system displays real-time toast messages for task and project updates, errors, and system alerts.

steps.description: Trigger events such as task creation, status update, failure in API calls
Verify toast notifications appear promptly with proper messages
Verify notifications can be dismissed and do not block UI controls

title: JWT Authentication and Session Management Security
description: Verify that JWT tokens are issued, refreshed, and revoked appropriately and sessions are managed securely to prevent unauthorized access.

steps.description: Login and verify JWT token is received
Navigate various protected routes with token
Verify access is granted while token is valid
Simulate token expiration
Verify user is logged out or prompted to re-authenticate
Attempt token reuse after logout
Verify access is denied and user redirected to login
